About Me

Welcome to my portfolio! I am Fazil S, a passionate and driven professional with a background in Electronics and Communication Engineering, complemented by a strong foundation in software development. My expertise lies in creating dynamic and responsive web applications using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, and Node.js).

Projects

  1. Airplane Management System

    The notion of airline booking is based on making and canceling flight bookings. The system does not have a login function. Users may simply book flights, cancel reservations, and look up information. It has a variety of payment options for bookings. This tiny project has fewer features, but they are the most important ones.

  2. E-voting Machine

    The goal of the undertaking is to use the C programming language to create a prototype for an online voting system. We want to build a safe, straightforward-to-use platform that lets people cast ballots from the comfort of their own devices remotely by utilizing technology.

  3. hangman game

    Hangman Game using Python and MongoDB involves designing an interactive word-guessing game where players attempt to guess a secret word within a limited number of attempts. MongoDB can be used to store the game's word bank, player progress, or high scores.

  4. Online Bookstore Application

    Online Bookstore App using Java and SQL involves developing a user-friendly application where customers can browse books, add them to their cart, and purchase them. SQL databases will be used to manage books, users, orders, and transactions
